title: Families Worth up to $100 Million Prefer Algorithmic Cryptocurrencies to Tokens — Study
description: Families with a net worth of up to $100 million exhibit a strong preference for algorithmic cryptocurrencies over tokens (4.32% versus 0.92%), a new study has found. The study cites statistics indicating that ownership continuity is disrupted in 91% of cases involving a transition from crypto to fiat and vice versa. Traceability of Ownership Continuity […]

title: Derby College Teacher Introduces AI-Infused Virtual Mind Palace
description: Derby College has unveiled an initiative to alleviate exam anxiety while enhancing students’ learning experiences through cutting-edge AI technology. Spearheaded by Glyn Pickering, a distinguished educator at the college, this pioneering system promises to revolutionize how students prepare for exams by leveraging the latest advancements in Artificial Intelligence. Innovative solution for exam anxiety Glyn Pickering’s […]

title: Adobe Summit 2024 – Unlocking the Potential of Personalization at Scale
description: The latest Adobe Summit, where Adobe Systems Inc. demonstrated its ability to transform digital experiences through customization at scale using generative AI, is at the center of the tech community’s discourse.
